GENERAL WEATHER FORECAST FOR NEXT 36 HOURS
Issued at 04.00 p.m. on 12 November 2024
A  low-pressure  area  is  formed  over  the  south  west  Bay  of  Bengal  today  (12).  Under  its  influence,
atmospheric conditions will be favorable for afternoon thundershowers in most parts of the island from
13th November.
Several spells of showers may occur in Northern Province. Showers or thundershowers will occur at several
places elsewhere during the evening or night.

H
eavy showers about 100 mm are likely at some places in Central, Uva, Sabaragamuwa, and Southern
provinces.

M
isty conditions can be expected at some places in Western, Sabaragamuwa, Central and Uva provinces
and in Galle and Matara districts during the morning.

T
he general public is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused by temporary
localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.

Heavy rain: 100 – 150, Very heavy rain: 150 or more.
